story_parts.text: The lion was very excited to go to Disney World. He had always wanted to go there and finally had the chance. He packed his bags and went on his way.

next_options.0: The lion had a great time at Disney World
next_options.1: The lion was disappointed with Disney World

story_parts.text: The lion had a great time at Disney World. He went on all the rides and met all the characters. He even got to go to the front of the line a few times. The lion had a blast and would definitely go back again.

next_options.0: The lion went home and told all his friends about his great time at Disney World
next_options.1: The lion decided to stay at Disney World and live there forever

story_parts.text: The lion went home and told all his friends about his great time at Disney World. His friends were so jealous and wished they could go too. The lion said that maybe one day they could all go together. That would be even more fun!

next_options.0: The lion's friends start saving up money so they can all go to Disney World together
next_options.1: The lion's friends get jobs at Disney World so they can all go together

story_parts.text: The lion's friends start saving up money so they can all go to Disney World together. They are all excited to go and have a great time together. The lion is especially excited because he knows that his friends will have just as much fun as he did.

next_options.0: The lion's friends save up enough money and they all go to Disney World together

story_parts.text: The lion's friends save up enough money and they all go to Disney World together. They have a blast! They go on all the rides and see all the sights. The lion is especially happy because he gets to share his favorite place with his friends.
